        Parameters:
        name - city's name
        surface - city's surface
        population - city's population
        altitude - city's altitude
        yearFounded - the year when the city was founded
        latitude - city's latitude
        longitude - city's longitude
        topLeftX - city's top left x coordinate in picture
        topLeftY - city's top left y coordinate in picture
        centerX - city's center x coordinate
        centerY - city's center y coordinate
